verbs.description: [V: sce&g] files lawsuit over law that gave customers lower bills the utility filed the lawsuit monday in federal court claiming that the measure passed last week by the south carolina legislature is unconstitutional law general assembly scanasceg senate scana columbia south carolina fairfield county south carolina henry mcmaster vc summer nuclear station dominion energy santee cooper
